channel.title: League of Legends wins?
channel.description:
screenies, NAO.
srsly, this is the best I have done. the only time i died is if presto came up after i killed the whole team off when i was 1/4 on health lol .
[url=http://aar.im/u/okayp-8c][img]http://aar.im/i/okayp-8c.png[/img][/url]
and, some other games.
[url=http://aar.im/u/getat-e0][img]http://aar.im/i/getat-e0.png[/img][/url]
[url=http://aar.im/u/Untit-i2][img]http://aar.im/i/Untit-i2.png[/img][/url]
Am working on a video! Should be up in a week or so. Meanwhile, POST YOUR WINS

item.title: League of Legends wins?
item.dc:creator: @hat_trix hat trix
item.description:
@hat_trix wrote:

[quote=“reyx7, post:6, topic:450208”][quote author=hat trix link=topic=553108.msg4052878#msg4052878 date=1342678135]

Only noobs get crushed by Yi (no offense).
Also, you can’t have a negative ratio w/ darius.

funny, I never lose. never EVER
[/quote]

23-21. K.

Also, I’d recommend a black cleaver rather then the 2nd IE. You’re getting plenty of AD from the BT (assuming you’re racking up major kills, which you are) and plenty of crit from the PD. The black cleaver is able to smash through armor, and with your attack speed you’ll reduce it the cap on BC pretty quickly, letting you take down tanks a bit faster.[/quote]

Yeh, alot of my losses though are with fizz before I knew how to play, and yeah good idea. I have actually been using black cleaver here recently. It works pretty good

newest match.
cmon noobs, post some.

Read full topic

item.title: League of Legends wins?
item.dc:creator: @reyx7 reyx7
item.description:
@reyx7 wrote:

[quote=“hat trix, post:4, topic:450208”][quote author=reyx7 link=topic=553108.msg4052730#msg4052730 date=1342668892]
Only noobs get crushed by Yi (no offense).
Also, you can’t have a negative ratio w/ darius.
[/quote]

funny, I never lose. never EVER :P[/quote]

23-21. K.

Also, I’d recommend a black cleaver rather then the 2nd IE. You’re getting plenty of AD from the BT (assuming you’re racking up major kills, which you are) and plenty of crit from the PD. The black cleaver is able to smash through armor, and with your attack speed you’ll reduce it the cap on BC pretty quickly, letting you take down tanks a bit faster.

Read full topic

item.title: League of Legends wins?
item.dc:creator: @Tom Tom
item.description:
@Tom wrote:

I remember when I played Master Yi, he’s easy to grasp I think the issue is that people panic because of his speed. If you actually stay calm and think he usually isn’t that big of an issue.

Read full topic
